## getNativeTokenByChainId() function

Returns the native token for a given chain

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function getNativeTokenByChainId(chainId: ChainId): NativeToken;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type    | Description  |
| --------- | ------- | ------------ |
| chainId   | ChainId | the chain id |

**Returns:**

NativeToken
